程序包 org.am21.model.items

类 Board

java.lang.Object
org.am21.model.items.Grid
org.am21.model.items.Board
public class Board extends Grid
This class is the board of the game

  • 方法详细资料

    • firstSetup

      public boolean firstSetup()
      This method is used to refill the board ONLY for the first time
      返回:
      true if the refill is successful

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Setting the size of the grid according to the number of player
      返回:
      number of cell available to play

    • hasFreeSide

      public boolean hasFreeSide(int r, int c)
      Condition 1: Verify if the celle exists Verify if the Item(r,c) is available to the player to pick. To be available, it needs to have at least one side free and also, if the player pick more items, they need to form a straight line Index (0-rowNum-1,0-colNum-1) Checking four side of the item(r,c) if they are free

      Could be improved, maybe need to be more efficient

      It is different from isSingle

      参数:
      r - row
      c - column
      返回:
      true if the item has free side, otherwise false

    • isOrthogonal

      public boolean isOrthogonal(int r, int c, List<CardPointer> selItems)
      Condition 2: depends on the others selected card The selected tiles need to be on a Straight Line And the new card needs to be adjacent to one of the old cards

      参数:
      r - row
      c - column
      selItems - selected items list
      返回:
      true if the conditions are respected, otherwise false

    • isAlone

      public boolean isAlone(int r, int c)
      Check if the item is isolated in the board It means that there isn't any item adjacent.
      参数:
      r - row
      c - column
      返回:
      true if the item is isolated, otherwise false

    • checkBoard

      public boolean checkBoard()
      Scan each cell of the board and verify if EVERY item is isolated
      返回:
      true if ALL item are isolated false: if at least one item is not isolated

    • isPlayable

      public boolean isPlayable(int r, int c)
      This method verifies if the cell is within the boundaries of this match
      参数:
      r - row
      c - column
      返回:
      true if the cell is playable
